experiences: Enhanced a personalized image annotation tool utilizing advanced deep learning techniques, resulting in a 50% increase in similar image retrieval accuracy.
Developed a user-friendly interface using Tkinter, allowing seamless image display, annotation, and search functionality.
Developed and optimized backend functionalities using Python, utilizing a pretrained ResNet-50 model to extract image features, significantly improving retrieval accuracy by 50%.
Developed a robust data management system for a law firm using Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and MySQL, delivering a case dashboard within 25 days that boosted user engagement and satisfaction.

Led the transition to a microservices architecture, reducing load times by 40% and improving system performance for 2,500+ active users. Migrated 1TB+ of legacy data with zero loss, enhancing operational efficiency.
Implemented key features including education, employment, and address management modules, and introduced a FAQ modal that reduced support queries by 20%.
Conducted rigorous testing during peak case seasons, resolving 25% of critical bugs, ensuring high-quality, stable releases.
Designed and optimized SQL queries and stored procedures, reducing report generation time for business analysts by over 30% and streamlining backend workflows.
Led functional API testing using Postman, validating request/response cycles, resolving edge-case failures, and ensuring reliable data exchange for onboarding workflows.
Collaborated with QA and DevOps teams to document API changes, maintain workflow traceability in Confluence, and ensure audit readiness across development sprints.
Investigated and resolved critical backend issues, including API failures and data discrepancies, reducing ticket escalations through improved exception handling and enhanced database efficiency
